heading: Casting
welcomeHeading: Welcome to Qingdao Lolin Mech Inc.

sections.heading: General Information
paragraphs: We provide a wide range of casting materials and sizes.
Our factories offer advanced sand casting and investment casting technologies with maximum casting capacity of 70,000 tons annually. There are all together 600 staffs of the company.
We are able to supply different kinds of materials, the typical materials of which are:
Austempered ductile Iron: ADI 800-10 (EN-GJS-800-8), ADI 1050-6 (EN-GJS-1000-5), ADI 1200-3 (EN-GJS-1200-2), ADI 1400-1 (EN-GJS-1400-1)
The industries we are supplying: Construction machinery, Automotive industry, Railway vehicle manufacturing, Machine building
Suitable Weight: from 0.1 kg to 400 kgs
Flask Size: 450x400 mm,15 flasks/hr. / 850x700 mm, 15 flasks/hr. / 1200x1000x1000 mm, 50 flasks/hr.

sections.heading: Foundry Equipment
paragraphs: Our foundry is equipped with state-of-the-art moulding lines, core shooters, and melting furnaces for efficient and precise casting production.

sections.heading: Testing Equipment
paragraphs: We ensure the highest quality through chemical analysis, mechanical property testing, and dimensional inspections.

sections.heading: Machining Equipment
paragraphs: Our machining capabilities include CNC turning, milling, and multi-axis machining centers to meet precision requirements.

sections.heading: Typical Products
paragraphs: We produce a variety of typical products for automotive, rail, and industrial use.
